      • pushLocalFirmware

        public void pushLocalFirmware(byte[] firmwareData,
                              long stateTransitionTimeout)
                       throws IllegalStateException
        Push local firmware.
        Parameters:
        firmwareData - The firmware data to upload
        stateTransitionTimeout - the timeout in milliseconds to wait for the device to transition to a next state
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - when firmware upload process is already running

      • pullRemoteFirmware

        Pull remote firmware.
        Parameters:
        version - the firmware version string
        stateTransitionTimeout - the timeout in milliseconds to wait for the device to transition to a next state
